text: The following lists events that happened in 1919 in Iceland. ==Incumbents== *Monarch - Kristján X *Prime Minister - Jón Magnússon ==Events== *15 November - Icelandic parliamentary election, 1919 *1919 Úrvalsdeild ==Births== *25 February - Magnús Kjartansson, journalist, writer and politician (d. 1981). *2 June - Pétur Sigurgeirsson, bishop (d. 2010) *21 November - Helgi Hóseasson, carpenter, atheist and socialist (d. 2009) ==Deaths== Björn M. Ólsen *16 January - Björn M. Ólsen, scholar and politician (b. 1850). ==References== Category:1910s in Iceland Iceland Iceland Category:Years of the 20th century in Iceland
title: 1919 in Iceland
